pr_title: Don't call Processor.close on cooperative thread

timeline.message:
Don't call Processor.close on cooperative thread

Fixes #1793

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if this will slow down job completion, since most processors will have a noop close implementation?
timeline.author: cangencer

replies.bodyText: Maybe we can have a no-op constant that we recognize and short-circuit this?
